en.title: [2024] Vital Statistics
en.description: Annual births and deaths at national, state, and administrative district level, including birth, death, and fertility rates.
en.description_email: DOSM has just released the latest annual vital statistics, covering births and deaths at national, state, and administrative district level, including birth, death, and fertility rates.

bm.title: [2024] Perangkaan Penting
bm.description: Kelahiran dan kematian tahunan di peringkat negara, negeri, dan daerah pentadbiran, termasuk kadar kelahiran, kematian, dan kesuburan.
bm.description_email: DOSM telah menerbitkan perangkaan penting tahunan terkini, merangkumi kelahiran dan kematian di peringkat negara, negeri, dan daerah pentadbiran, termasuk kadar kelahiran, kematian, dan kesuburan.
